
# Cardano Example Dapp

## **Scopes Demo**

Script that will test and explore code scopes and inline macro scripting access reach


## Try it online: 

-  Visit [HTML5 Dapp](https://gamechangerfinance.github.io/gamechanger.wallet/examples/Scopes%20Demo.html)
-  Run [Standalone URL dapp ## Source code:

- dapp connection code: [GCScript DSL](Scopes%20Demo.gcscript)
- frontend (using @gamechanger-finance/gc): [HTML5 dapp](Scopes%20Demo.html)
- frontend (without official library): [Native HTML5 dapp](Scopes%20Demo_nolib.html)

Dapp code was autogenerated by [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground)

## GCScript code (dapp connection):
```json
{
  "title": "Scopes Demo",
  "description": "Script that will test and explore code scopes and inline macro scripting access reach. It uses hexadecimal protocol for script uris (0x)",
  "type": "script",
  "returnURLPattern": "http://localhost:3000/demo/api/dapp",
  "run": {
    "nestedScripts": {
      "type": "importAsScript",
      "description": "Block of code that contains the imported code",
      "argsByKey": {
        "LEVEL_1": "Injected LEVEL_1 args"
      },
      "from": {
        "LEVEL_1": "",
        "SIBLING_CHECK_1": ""
      }
    },
    "scopeDebug": {
      "type": "macro",
      "run": "{console('log',get('cache'),get('args'))}"
    }
  }
}
```

## Run standalone QR dapp connection: 

You can use [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground) in `QR URL Transport` mode to capture results

[![This GCScript/URL is too large! make it shorter uploading parts to GCFS. Unable to generate QR code](Scopes%20Demo.png)](https://gamechangerfinance.github.io/gamechanger.wallet/examples/Scopes%20Demo.png)
